net.matuschek.http
Interface HttpToolCallback

All Known Implementing Classes:
SystemOutHttpToolCallback
public interface HttpToolCallback

Callback interface to inform a frontend about the state of the current HttpTool download operation

Method Summary
 void setHttpToolDocCurrentSize(int size)
          after a block of bytes was read (default after every 1024 bytes, this method will be called
 void setHttpToolDocSize(int size)
          After HttpTool got a Content-Length header this method will be called to inform about the size of the document to retrieve
 void setHttpToolDocUrl(java.lang.String url)
          After initiating a download, this method will be called to inform about the URL that will be retrieved
 void setHttpToolStatus(int status)
          informs about the current status of the HttpTool
